destinations.Name: SAP-Build-Apps-Runtime
destinations.Description: Endpoint to SAP Build Apps runtime

executeAfterAccountSetup.description: Add role BuildAppsAdmin to role collection BuildAppsAdmin
executeAfterAccountSetup.command: btp add security/role BuildAppsAdmin --to-role-collection BuildAppsAdmin --of-role-template BuildAppsAdmin --of-app $(jq -r '.[]  | select(.roleTemplateName=="BuildAppsAdmin") | .roleTemplateAppId' ./log/list_security_roles.json) --subaccount $(jq -r '.subaccountid' ./log/metadata_log.json)
